Service Details: Provides free flights to Canadians who cannot afford the cost of an airline ticket to get to specialized medical care outside their home communities
Eligibility: Flights are arranged on Canada's national and regional airlines and on private planes for those:- who are flying for a confirmed medical appointment that is covered by their provincial health plan- who are unable to afford the airline ticket (financial details for household are required)- whose doctor confirms they are medically fit to fly
How to Apply: Please call or visit the website
